模块 com.example.BubbleBobble
程序包 com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.InteractableWorld

类 StaticComponentFactory

java.lang.Object
com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.Unit.UnitFactory
com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.InteractableWorld.StaticComponentFactory
public class StaticComponentFactory extends UnitFactory
StaticComponentFactory is the concrete factory of Unit Factory to create Unit Inside its CreateUnit method, the method would return corresponding type of unit according to attribute 'type'

    • CreateUnit

      public Unit CreateUnit​(char type, InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum)
      Concrete method to create specific kind of unit
      指定者:
      CreateUnit 在类中 UnitFactory
      参数:
      type - the type of the unit
      world - the world parameter
      colNum - the column number
      rowNum - the row number
      返回:
      the specific unit according to its type
